sentences.en: A third group were obdurate and still wanted to wait and see.
sentences.cn: 第三部分人则是顽固地还要等着看.

sentences.en: He is obdurate in his convictions.
sentences.cn: 他执着于自己所坚信的事.

sentences.en: He remained obdurate, refusing to alter his decision.
sentences.cn: 他依然固执己见, 拒不改变决定.

sentences.en: If Iran is obdurate, each set of leads to the next.
sentences.cn: 假如伊朗执迷不悟, 每一套制裁接着就是下一套.

sentences.en: Paul Skinner an obdurate opponent of BHP's advances, had recently stood down as chairman of Rio.
sentences.cn: 保罗?斯金纳刚从力拓董事长职位上退下.他之前一直反对必和必拓的追求.

sentences.en: She is of obdurate temperament, and gets angry easily.
sentences.cn: 她是个左性子, 动不动就发火.

sentences.en: The child's misery would move even the most obdurate heart.
sentences.cn: 这个孩子的悲惨遭遇即使最冷酷的心肠也会为之动情.

sentences.en: The struggle shall be waged only against a few obdurate landlords after they have been isolated.
sentences.cn: 只有对个别顽固分子,才经过一番孤立工作之后,实行斗争的方式.

sentences.en: They argued, but he remained obdurate.
sentences.cn: 他们发生了争论，但他还是固执己见。

words.tran_cn: 顽固的，执拗的；冷酷无情的

trans.tran_cn: 顽固的，执拗的，麻木不仁的，冷酷无情的
trans.tran_en: very determined not to change your beliefs, actions, or feelings, in a way that seems unreasonable
